attributes.action: Allow the csa to ofset monies owed between parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am paying the CSA monies for my eldest son.
Yet I am supporting 2 daughters from my wifes previous marriage.
The CSA say that they cannot get any monies from him as he now lives in Spain.Yet his mother recieves her pension out there so it would seem the Goverment can cross boarders when it suits them.
I am asking why the monies owed to us by him cannot be ofset against what we pay to my exwife

rejection.details: Individual case details should be taken up directly with the CSA.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
